Package edu.cpp.cs.cs141.GECLYfinalproj

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Locatable
    Locatable is an interface designed for objects that appear on the main game grid.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Agent
    This class represents an agent in the game (enemies and the player) and is the parent class for Player and Ninja.
    Briefcase
    This class represents the object Briefcase that is to be collected by the player's character in the game.
    ConsoleInterface
    This class represents the console based interface which will involve console elements like the Scanner and System.out.
    Engine
    This class represents the game engine and is where all of the game logic and operations take place in.
    FileManager
    This class deals with the saving and loading of a game.
    GraphicInterface
    This is the GraphicInteface.
    Grid
    This class represents the grid that the game takes place on and all of the objects interact with each other in, one of the fundamental parts of the game.
    Location
    This class represents the location of a Locatable object for use with the engine.
    Main
    This class is the main class where the game will start when the method UserInterface.startGame() is called.
    Ninja
    This class represents a Ninja Assassin, which is a subclass of the Agent abstract class.
    Player
    This class represents the Player of the game which is a subclass of the Agent abstract class.
    Room
    This class represents a room which can contain the briefcase or an item in the game.
    UserInterface
    This class represents the interface facilitating communication between the user and the game.
    WorldItem
    This class represents all the items found in the game like the power ups and the briefcase.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Action
    This enum is for use with the player and keeps track of what they did on their last turn.
    Direction
    This enum represents a direction for use with looking and moving, and each constant basically holds a set of cordinates to add.
